name: Orange Asiatic Lilies
description: is an eye-catching bloom that can't be missed
care: will need bulbs planted with good drainage. Asiatics need 1 or 2 inches of water per week

name: Red Carnations
description: A single flower, delicate multi-petaled, double blossom at the end of a long stem.
care: Protecting carnations from frost encourages growth the next year. Either install a hoop greenhouse or dig up the plant and bring it inside for the cold winter.

name: Red Roses
description: A rose in full bloom is truly but a pretty sight, something worth wasting time upon
care: rose bushes should receive six to eight hours of sunlight daily.

name: Hydrangeas
description: The large flowerheads look like pom poms growing on bushes that can get as tall as trees.
care: Plan to water your hydrangeas regularly to keep them consistently moist, especially in hot and dry weather and fertilize them once in the spring.

name: Sunflowers
description: They are bright and cheery, and as warm and inviting as the sweet summer sun.
care: A potted sunflower needs enough sunlight, as well as regular watering.

name: Lavender
description: The leaves can be silvery grey to bright green and the blooms can be deep purple to blue-purple, pink, and even white. And it's smell is an experience that everyone should have!
care: Lavenders demand full sun, and all lavenders should be pruned once a year to keep them low and full.
